    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"

>
[Incredible Ferocity](/Feats.aspx?ID=90) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Orc" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=124" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 59 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Orc Ferocity](/Feats.aspx?ID=83)

</column>

---

Given time to collect yourself after a near-death scrape, you can rebuild your ferocity and withstand additional finishing blows. You can use [Orc Ferocity](/Feats.aspx?ID=83) with a frequency of once per hour, rather than once per day.
name: Incredible Ferocity
